content.text: Welcome! In this lesson, you'll learn what to say at a Spanish 'fiesta de cumpleaños' (birthday party).

data.tip: In Spain, the 'z' sounds like the 'th' in 'thin'. In most of Latin America, it sounds like an 's'.

data.meaning: Can you pass me a glass, please?

content.title: Felicitando al anfitrión
content.setting: You arrive at the party and find the host, Alex. After talking, you go to the drinks table and meet another guest, Carmen.

conversation_flow.title: Ask the other guest to pass you a glass
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: ¡Un regalo! Gracias. Las bebidas están en la mesa. (You walk to the drinks table and see another guest, Carmen) Carmen: Hola.

content.text: Use 'Me llamo...' followed by your name to introduce yourself to new people.

content.title: Uniéndose a una conversación
content.setting: You see Carmen talking to another person, David. You decide to join their conversation.

conversation_flow.title: Introduce yourself
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Carmen: ...y por eso la fiesta es ahora.

extract_info.user_name: Extract the user's name from their message

conversation_flow.title: Ask how they know Alex
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Carmen: ¡Hola, {user_name}! Yo soy Carmen, y él es David. David: ¡Hola!

conversation_flow.title: Explain how you know Alex
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Carmen: Alex y yo somos amigos. ¿Y tú?

conversation_flow.title: Acknowledge their comment
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: David: ¡Ah, de la clase de español! Alex habla mucho de la clase.

content.text: 'Fue un placer' is a polite way to signal the end of a conversation.

content.title: Despedirse y marcharse
content.setting: It's time to go home. You say goodbye to your new acquaintances and then find the host, Alex.

conversation_flow.title: Politely exit the conversation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Carmen: Sí, la música es muy buena.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are leaving
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: David: ¡Hablamos luego, {user_name}! (You find Alex) Alex: ¡{user_name}! ¿Ya te vas?

conversation_flow.title: Thank Alex for the party
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Alex: ¡Claro! Gracias a ti por venir.
